amendatorysection.catchline: Dropouts; report to Commissioner of Education; attendance reports.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The superintendent or head administrator of a public school district or a nonpublic school system shall annually report to the Commissioner of Education in such detail and on such date as required by the commissioner the number of students who have dropped out of school. School districts that are members of learning communities shall also provide the learning community coordinating council with a copy of such report on or before the date the report is due to the commissioner.

(2) The superintendent of a public school district shall report on a quarterly basis to the Commissioner of Education as directed by the commissioner regarding individual student information on attendance.
